item.title: RFK Jr. 'rejects' a U.N. declaration on non-communicable diseases
item.description: Global health leaders expressed dismay at Kennedy's objection but vowed to move forward without the support of the U.S.

item.title: 'Long history of blaming mothers': Trump's Tylenol warning echoes past misconceptions
item.description: Medical scholars say, efforts to find a singular cause for autism has historically led to scrutinizing parents and fueling stigma about autism

item.title: The U.N. utters the word: Dementia
item.description: For the first time, the United Nations has put forward a political declaration pledging to address dementia. Will it make a difference?
